extension.description: A music-focused service addon that shows a notification overlay for the next track in your playlist or music addon. Automatically continues playback to the next song.
extension.news: v2.0.0 (2026-02-24) - Full rename from "Up Next - Music" to "Next Track" - Purged all video/TV/episode terminology - Music-only addon: tracks, artists, albums - New notification signal: nexttrack_data / NEXTTRACKPLAYEDSIGNAL - Renamed all skin XML files to script-nexttrack-*
